sen.j: 近藤乾之助（こんどう けんのすけ、1928年（昭和3年）4月18日 -）とは、シテ方宝生流能楽師。
sen.e: Kennosuke KONDO (April 18, 1928-) is a shite-kata (a main actor) of the Hosho school of Noh.

sen.j: 父は近藤乾三、母は小鼓方大倉流宗家大倉六蔵の二女・喜久の長男。
sen.e: His father is Kenzo KONDO and his mother is Kiku's brother who is the second daughter of Rokuzo OHKURA, the head of kotsuzumi-gata (shoulder-drum) Ohkura school.
sen.cmt: ※原文に忠実に訳しましたが、原文に誤りがあるようです。近藤近藤乾三のWikiページには「妻は小鼓方大倉流宗家大倉六蔵の二女・喜久。」とありますので、「喜久の長男。」は「喜久。」と考えられます。(http://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E8%BF%91%E8%97%A4%E4%B9%BE%E4%B8%89)翻訳案：His father is Kenzo KONDO and his mother, Kiku, is the second daughter of Rokuzo OKURA, the head of Okura school.

sen.e: His father is Kenzo KONDO and his mother is Kiku's oldest son who is the second daughter of Rokuzo OHKURA, the head of kotsuzumi-gata (shoulder-drum) Ohkura school.
sen.cmt: brother →the oldest son翻訳者のコメントにあるように、、「喜久の長男。」は「喜久。」の間違いのようですが、指示書に従い、原文のとおり訳しております。

sen.j: 父に師事し、1933年 5歳で『鞍馬天狗』花見稚児で初舞台。
sen.e: He studied under his father and at the age of five he played his first role as a hanami-koji (a child who go to see the cherry blossoms viewing with the main character, Ushiwakamaru) in the play, "Kurama Tengu."
